summary: SRS LIGHT ON THE DASH STAYS ON.  DEALER SAID WIRING IS DEFECTIVE.  AIRBAG HAS NEVER GONE OFF AND THE CAR HAS NEVER BEEN IN AN ACCIDENT.  DEALER STATED THAT IT IS THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG.  THE DIAGNOSIS IS THAT THE WIRE SHOWS HIGH RESISTENCE.    THE MODULE WAS RESET, THE LIGHT ON THE DASH WENT OFF FOR THREE DAYS AND THEN CAME BACK ON.   THE DEALER WILL NOT REPAIR.  IT IS POSSIBLE THE AIR BAG WILL NOT WORK ACCORDING TO THE DEALER.   THE WIRING IS DEFECTIVE.
